alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Dubois; Harrison; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL HARRISON... SOUTHEASTERN DUBOIS...CENTRAL CRAWFORD...NORTHERN PERRY AND NORTHWESTERN MEADE COUNTIES THROUGH 230 AM EDT/130 AM CDT/... At 200 AM EDT/100 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Santa Claus, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carefree Town, Mount Pleasant, Leopold, Leavenworth, Alton, New Amsterdam, Roberta, Ranger, Beechwood and Terry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT/400 AM CDT/ for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
